text: @pwafork You don't care about the their lives? 40 deaths of meat workers dying of covid19 is unimportant to you? As long as you get your bacon for breakfast and your food supply uninterrupted. Why don't you go expose yourself to the corona virus under force by Trump for a lousy $7.25ph.
